ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed
2 cooked boneless chicken breast halves, chopped
2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, or to taste, divided

cookingTips: Thaw broccoli completely and squeeze out excess moisture to prevent a watery casserole
Reserve half the cheese to sprinkle on top for even melting and browning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This lighter take on classic casserole uses cauliflower rice. Combine Alfredo sauce with soup mix and chicken, then layer with vegetables and cheese. Bake covered at 375Â°F for 25 minutes, then uncovered for 10 minutes.
